summary.summary: A results-driven professional with a BCom in Industrial Psychology from UJ and a passion for driving organizational success. Currently pursuing a Postgraduate Business Administration degree with a focus on Digital Transformation. Proven track record as a Sales Agent at Telkom, demonstrating exceptional communication and negotiation skills. I am committed to leveraging academic and practical experiences to contribute effectively to dynamic business environments. Open to networking and exploring opportunities in the intersection of psychology, business, and digital transformation.

experience.duties:
Answered incoming telephone calls and responded to customer questions. Resolved problems according to standardized procedures while maintaining a courteous manner. Explained and provided clarity to customers on our telecommunication offerings. Responded to queries based on any Telkom product.
         Delivered quality customer service and developed relationships with prospective customers. Informed current and prospective customers of promotions and new or upgraded products. Quoted prices and encouraged customers to buy.
         Strong demonstrated ability to market and sell in a multi-product environment.
         Excellent interpersonal skills including written, verbal and presentation delivery. Ability to develop and maintain customer relationships.

skills.skills:
Communication skills, Customer service, Time management, Leadership, Presentation Skills, Problem Resolution,
        Teamwork, Computer Literacy, Adaptability, Conflict Management, Microsoft Office, Strategic Thinking, Change
        Management, Innovation, Project Management, Data Analytics, Employee Relations, Organizational Behavior, Psyhological
        Insight, Research & Analysis, Personnel Assessment, Ethical Awareness, Interpersonal Skills, Negotiation
